## Calendar3x4

![calendar-3x4](data:image/png;base64,)

| | value |
|---|---|
| **name** | calendar-3x4 |
| **width** | 399 |
| **height** | 480 |

### Configuration Example

```yaml
- name: calendar-3x4
  config:
    ics:
      name: ics
      timezone: Europe/Paris
      calendars: []

```
## Countdown2x1

![countdown-2x1](data:image/png;base64,)

| | value |
|---|---|
| **name** | countdown-2x1 |
| **width** | 266 |
| **height** | 120 |

### Configuration Example

```yaml
- name: countdown-2x1
  config:
    title: New decade
    date_start: 2020-01-01
    date_end: 2030-01-01

```
## Velib1x1

![velib-1x1](data:image/png;base64,)

| | value |
|---|---|
| **name** | velib-1x1 |
| **width** | 133 |
| **height** | 120 |

### Configuration Example

```yaml
- name: velib-1x1
  config:
    velib:
      station_id: 213686196

```
## WeatherRecap3x2

![weather-recap-3x2](data:image/png;base64,)

| | value |
|---|---|
| **name** | weather-recap-3x2 |
| **width** | 399 |
| **height** | 240 |

### Configuration Example

```yaml
- name: weather-recap-3x2
  config:
    weather:
      lat: 48.871
      lon: 2.292
      timezone: Europe/Paris

```
